definition: so horrible and distasteful to people that it's incapable of being justified or explained
details:
adjective
- so horrible and distasteful to people that it's incapable of being justified or explained
= example: so horrible and distasteful to people that it's incapable of being justified or explained
= synonyms: insupportable, unjustifiable, unwarrantable, unwarranted
- incapable of being logically explained as a concept or idea
= example: incapable of being logically explained as a concept or idea
= synonyms: untenable
- not able to be protected against a literal attack
= example: not able to be protected against a literal attack
